title: Senior Accountant
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Location: Salt Lake City, UT (hybrid work schedule; 2 days per week in office & 3 days per week from home) 
We're on the lookout for a Senior Accountant who's got a knack for crunching numbers and can handle everything from technical analyses to month-end closings with a cool head. You'd be working closely with our Assistant Controller and Controller, putting your sharp accounting skills to work on things like reconciliations, journal entries, and a bunch of reporting stuff.
What you'll be getting your hands into:

Whip up some bespoke reports and the monthly financials that the higher-ups love to see.
Close out the month like a champ with journal entries and tie up any loose ends with reconciliations.
Give the once-over to the regular tasks and outputs our awesome team puts together.
Help us make sense of all our financials by lending a hand in pulling them all together.
Jump into the tech side of things by helping out with new system rollouts and reporting tools that keep us ahead of the curve.
Document how we do what we do in the accounting world, so it's smooth sailing for everyone.

The bigger picture stuff:

You'll be diving into some of the techier parts of the accounting process, making sure those journal entries and reconciliations are spot-on.
Hunt down the info needed for both the regular reports and those off-the-cuff ones that pop up.
Stand shoulder to shoulder with our Accounting Management to roll up financial results all the way to the parent company.
Keep a keen eye on our team's work to ensure it's top-notch.
Spot and fix any hiccups in the general ledger.
Lead the charge on special projects that come our way.
Be the go-to person for our other staff, guiding them through their day-to-day and under the wise wing of Accounting Management.

To land this gig, you'll need:

A Bachelor's degree in Finance or Accounting, or the equivalent work experience to back it up.
At least a couple of years with a public accounting firm under your belt, or four years in the accounting trenches.
A real solid grip on all those accounting principles and practices, especially when it comes to accruals, reserves, the works.
Mad skills in Excel and a knack for working with data and systems.
The ability to juggle tasks and stick to deadlines like they're glued to you.
A self-starter attitude with a curious mind that's always ready to learn more.

Would be awesome if you also had:

Some history with public accounting.
A Master's degree in Finance or Accounting and that shiny CPA certification.
Some familiarity with VBA and SQL, and ERP systems wouldn't hurt.
Stellar communication skills, because what's the point if you can't get your point across, right?
Superb people skills to work well with the team and maybe show some of the newbies the ropes.

Sound like your kind of gig? We can't wait to see what you bring to the table!About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
